duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct investigative work to trace the root cause back as a system defect, product enhancement, or change management issue
Provide support to customers and interface with software developers when application quality issues arise; prepare corrective action and follow up on implementation and closeout
Work with product owners to prioritize system enhancements or issues and participate in Sprint planning and user acceptance testing prior to release
Participate in customer and internal conference calls for high-profile cases and escalations
Proactively identify issues and driving continuous improvement across the company
Performs other job-related duties as assigned
